If you use these tags What are these tags, why are they there, how to use them What are the benefits we will see in this video Let's go to the computer screen Let's roll the intro So guys, first of understand your website properly And tells them what is the content of your website And what is the purpose of the tag Even if you don't use Semantic Tags in html Then also your work will be done It's not like if you don't use Semantic Tags Then your website will not look good You can do a good job designing your website But we want to explain Google and Bing search engines About our website And if we explain them about our website Then they will understand our website And they will rank our website on Google, Bing And respective search engines And we want crawlers to understand our website And we want that whoever wants to understand our website They can understand it properly There are many tags like header, nav, main, article, figure These are all special tags in html Which helps in structuring your website Now if there is something in header Then I know that it's header, it's top If there is something in footer, then I will understand That the website has started ending and the footer has started This footer could have been div But no, if I am using Semantic html Then I will not make my navigation bar in span tag This time I will not make my navigation bar in span tag I will make my navigation bar in nav tag So these kind of differences Explain our search engines very well About our website So I will show you some examples of Semantic Tags And I hope you understood what should not do this Some people go to the extent that they start Spreading files in their local disk C And some people keep files in system32 So if you spread your files In your computer, then it
